short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT FOR A REQUIREMENT FOR INFLATABLE LIFE RAFTS
full_summary:
=====================================

**Life Raft, Inflatable Tender Notice**
=====================================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-237366/A
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01008380
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** September 27, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 28, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **End User:** Department of National Defence
* **Deliver To:** Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Montreal

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the delivery of four (4) life rafts, inflatable. The deadline for delivery is December 15, 2022. Proposers are asked to submit their offers in either official language of Canada.

### Tender Specifications

* **GSIN:** 4220
* **Part Number:** 6143-CF
* **Unit of Issue:** Each
* **Quantity:** 4

**Documents and Submissions**
-----------------------------

The tender documents, including the bid solicitation document, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website: 

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/\//2022/09/27//f688bf93d8c8c1b662591313298d9076/w8485-237366a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf 
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/\//2022/09/29/\//66b285a9f460ea9aea50ee07afdca35c/w8485-237366a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/\//2022/09/29/\//c4eba44755d8f7cb731bcfe114bebf7c/w8485-237366a_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf 
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/\//2022/09/27/\//21b2d213ced4491ad28e48860e844435/w8485-237366a_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf
